title: Disturbing Music Loops
description: A collection of music for creating a disturbing and gloomy atmosphere, including 15 themes with two versions of each and a total of 30 seamless loops, totaling over 50 minutes in length.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/disturbing-music-loops

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/9h1x45ah1hny3xl/MSE%20-%20Disturbing%20Music%20Loops_v1.0.pdf?dl=0


A collection of music for creating a disturbing and gloomy atmosphere, totaling over 50 minutes in length.


The package contains 15 themes with two versions of each and a total of 30 seamless loops in a single 100bpm tempo. The duration of each loop is 1 minute 41 seconds.


Use loops as ready-made compositions for disturbing, creepy and spooky gameplay or battle scenes, background menus, trailer music, animations or videos.


You can also divide all completed compositions into bars or beats, and to create ever-changing music and extra variation, you can start your beat from a new place each time. Don't be afraid to experiment.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 15 music themes
  • 30 music loops
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • all tracks in 100bpm
  • great for disturbing and gloomy atmosphere
  • perfect for RPGs, Fighting, Adventure, Horror, Shooter, and other game genres


Number of Audio Wavs: 30

Number of Audio Cues: 30

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 50 minutes 30 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
